data.persona: I attend the church every week and say my prayers dutifully. I always put coins in the poor box. I light a candle for my departed mother.
data.description:
You are in the Beside church pews.
The church pews fill the church as far as the eye can see. They are made of wood, harvested from ancient trees long ago. They gleam with the look of tender love and care, since they are polished after each ceremony.
There's a pew, a wood, a carvings, a candle, a handle, and an altar here.
The follower and the founder are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to drop the sack at the church
data.mid_motivation: I want to give the sack of the best part of my harvest to the church today
data.long_motivation: I hope the sack is useful to the church in the coming winter
